sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from ',  item().tableSchemaName, '.', item().tableName, ' WHERE ', item().WaterMark_Column, ' >= ''', formatDateTime(adddays(utcnow(), -7), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '''')

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('delete  from ', item().tableSchemaName, '.', item().tableName, ' WHERE ', item().WaterMark_Column, ' >= ''', formatDateTime(adddays(utcnow(), -7), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '''')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: select WatermarkValue from watermarktable where TableName='@{item().tableName}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select refreshed as status from mastertable where tableName='sales_table'
